thread.section_title: Hotel La Lanterne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: It's a Jewel!
thread.title_full: It's a Jewel! - Review of Hotel La Lanterne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AndraNM
title: It's a Jewel!
text:
I always look for a unique boutique hotel to stay in when traveling. This one is truly a find. Every inch was thought through. The rooms are a bit tight but the designers planned these well. Beds are very comfortable. Great bathroom with towel warmers.
Service was spot on. The small lounge is adorable and enjoyable. Wine bar and coffee bar excellent. Breakfast selection great.
The hotel is in a perfect location also! Look to your right below the street grade for the entry.
